Feb. 21, 1981 D Imperial Youth Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Imperial Youth Brass Band Contest (Section A) 100 Entertainments Contest with Deportment Mark Imperial Hotel Entertainment Contest imperial-youth-brass-band-contest-section-a
None
Imperial Hotel, Blackpool, Lancashire Music adjudicator: William Skelton; Entertainment adjudicator: Gary Newborough. 6th annual contest.
There were no adult sections.
